publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-901 Ms Margaret Curran: The Draft Housing Support Grant (Scotland) Order 2004-That the Communities Committee recommends that the draft Housing Support Grant (Scotland) Order 2004 be approved. Supported by: Mrs Mary Mulligan*

S2M-901 Ms Margaret Curran: The Draft Housing Support Grant (Scotland) Order 2004-That the Communities Committee recommends that the draft Housing Support Grant (Scotland) Order 2004 be approved. Supported by: Mrs Mary Mulligan
